Package com.movlad.semviz.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferAttribute
    Class representing one attribute of a buffer layout, such as position, color, texture coordinates etc.
    BufferLayout
    Keeps structural and size-related information concerning the layout of a VertexBufferObject, such as position, color, texture coordinates etc.
    ElementBufferObject
    Also called index buffer object, it allows re-using points in a VertexBufferObject multiple times to draw shapes composed of two or more triangles having common points.
    ShaderProgram
    Shader program that runs on the GPU.
    ShaderSource  
    VertexArrayObject
    Stores the layout for one or more VertexBufferObject instances.
    VertexBufferObject
    Stores the raw data concerning what is to be drawn by OpenGL, such as vertex positions, colors, texture coordinates etc.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ShaderType
